member.name: T:Policheck.Automation.Message
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.Message.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Set the Severity applicable for the task.

member.summary: Sets the Global Exclusions applicable for the task.

member.summary: Sets the Personal Exclusions applicable for the task.

member.name: M:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.Start(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts the execution of task on specified PoliCheck remote host.
member.param: Machine acting as Remote Host for PoliCheck.
Port number on the machine open for listening to remote scan task requests.

member.name: M:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.Stop
member.summary: Terminates a task that is in progress.
member.returns: true if the request to terminate the task was accepted successfully.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.ProgressEventCall
member.summary: Progress chnaged event object for the task to bind the client's progress change event.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.CompleteEventCall
member.summary: Scan complete event object for the task to bind the client's complete event.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.CheckCodeComments
member.summary: This option enables PoliCheck to report if the term is in a comment or not. By default it is false.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.FileTypeSettingsFile
member.summary: Specify the File Type Settings file path if the FileTypeSettingsMode property is set to CUSTOM.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.FileTypeSettingsMode
member.summary: Specify whether Task will use the default File Type Settings File or the Custom on. By default Task will use the default File Type Settings file.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.GlobalExclusions
member.summary: Gets the list of Global Exclusion applied for the task. This Global Exclusion setting works with the SQL term database or XML personal tables only.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.IncludeSubDir
member.summary: Set this property to True, to enable scanning of all the sub directories under your target folder By default it is true.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.PersonalExclusions
member.summary: Gets the list of Personal exclusions applied on the task. This Personal Exclusion setting are read from rule.mdb

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.SaveResultsToLocation
member.summary: Target location where Policheck will save the scan results. If the SaveResultMode is SQLSERVER then a valid connection string is required to export the results in sql server.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.SaveResultMode
member.summary: Get/Set mode for saving scan results.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.ScanType
member.summary: Type of scan.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.Severity
member.summary: Gets different level of term severity applied. By default only Severity 1 is turned on.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.Target
member.summary: Specify the path of target files/Folder/Batch.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.TargetType
member.summary: Specify the target Type. i.e. files/Folder/Batch.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.TaskName
member.summary: Specify the name for the task.

member.name: P:Policheck.Automation.FileTask.TermTableList
member.summary: Gets the list of Term tables applied on the task.

member.name: T:Policheck.Automation.FileTask._TermTables
member.summary: Collection class to store all the term sources referred in a PoliCheck Automation Task.

member.name: M:Policheck.Automation.FileTask._TermTables.#ctor(Policheck.Automation.FileTask)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Policheck.Automation.FileTask._TermTables.AddSQL(System.Int16)
member.summary: Specify the sql term tables to be used by the task. The SQL term database is the SQL Server database maintained by the GPS group. Only the GPS group can make changes to it.

member.name: M:Policheck.Automation.FileTask._TermTables.AddPersonal(System.String)
member.summary: Specify the personal term tables to be used by the task. The personal term table is either XML or MDB file which contains terms that are sensitive within different groups in Microsoft.

member.name: M:Policheck.Automation.FileTask._TermTables.AddKeyword(System.String)
member.summary: Specify the keywords to be used by the task. Keywords allow the user to enter terms manually during the setup of the task. These terms will be considered as sensitive terms and will not be saved except in that particular task.

member.name: T:Policheck.Automation.GlobalExclusions
member.summary: Global Exclusion setting works with the SQL term database or XML personal tables only. It enables or disables Exclusion string or Exception context.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.GlobalExclusions.EXCLUSIONS
member.summary: Enable term exclusion.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.GlobalExclusions.CONTEXT_EXCEPTION
member.summary: Enable context exclusion.

member.name: T:Policheck.Automation.PersonalExclusions
member.summary: Personal Exclusion settings are read from rule.mdb. It enables or disables Exclusion string, Exception file, Exception context, or both Exception file and context type of exclusions.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.PersonalExclusions.EXCLUSIONS
member.summary: Enables term exclusion.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.PersonalExclusions.FILE_EXCEPTION
member.summary: Enables file exclusion with term.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.PersonalExclusions.CONTEXT_EXCEPTION
member.summary: Enables context exclusion with term.

member.name: F:Policheck.Automation.PersonalExclusions.FILE_CTX_EXCEPTION
member.summary: Enables file and context exclusion with term.
